headline.main: NAZIS LAY MOVE TO BRITISH DESIGNS; Berlin Declares Occupation of Bulgaria Is Undertaken to Meet London's Threats REPORTS 'LIVELY' WELCOME Press Predicts Yugoslavia Will Fall in Line Soon and Hints at 'Fate' of Greece

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, March 2 -- The German High Command announced tonight that German troops had been marching into Bulgaria since this morning. The announcement of the occupation described the action as a counter-measure against anticipated moves by Britain.

keywords.name: glocations

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
